name: Medical Capsule
description: The medical capsule has a diagnostic computer, a variety of therapeutic medicines, and a database of medical procedures. Acts as a Doctor with C+S=TL. Aside from the standard Medical and Capsule modifications, also treats severe wounds or trauma; repairs, reattaches, or, if necessary, regrows a damaged or destroyed organ or limb, as a Doctor with C+S=TL. Each treatment puts the patient into suspended animation for 1D x 10 weeks, and injects the patient with tailored regrowth drugs and nutrients costing KCr100 (one dose per treatment).

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
